text: Aur qom-e-samood ki taraf unn kay bhai saleh ko bheja uss ney kaha aey meri qom tum Allah ki ibadat kero uss kay siwa tumahra koi mabood nahi ussi ney tumhen zamin say peda kiya hai aur ussi ney tumhen iss zamin mein basaya hai pus tum uss say moafi talab kero aur uss ki taraf rujoo kero. Be-shak mera rab qarib aur duaon ka qabool kerney wala hai
